sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; const Modals = (props) => { return (
{props.details.city_name}
Max Temp:
{props.details.max_temp}° c
Min Temp:
{props.details.min_temp}° c
Wind Speed:
{props.details.wind_speed}
Wind Degree:
{props.details.wind_degree}
Humidity:
{props.details.humidity}
Pressure:
{props.details.pressure}
Visibility:
{props.details.visibility}
Cloudiness:
{props.details.cloudiness}
Feels like:
{props.details.feeling}
{props.details.description}
latitude:
{props.details.lat}
longitude:
{props.details.long}
 ); }; export default Modals;
